sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"干涉，干预"之意。
means: interfere ： 侧重指无权或未获允许而妨碍、阻扰、干涉他人之事。
intervene ： 书面用词，指介入争端，进行调停，也指干涉他人之事。
meddle ： 指干预与自己毫不相关的事或不属于自己职责范围的事，隐含未经许可或授权。可与interfere换用。

sentence.Network_en: They're resentful that outsiders presume to meddle in their affairs.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们对外人擅自干预他们的事务非常愤慨。

sentence.Network_en: He had no right to meddle in her affairs.
I hope he doesn't try to meddle in my affairs.
sentence.Network_cn: 我希望他不来干预我的事情.

松松：3天背完GRE难词 ... whet vt. 磨, 磨快, 使兴奋 13。 meddle v. 管闲事 14。 obliterate vt. 涂去, 删除, 使湮没 15。.
GRE 同义词总结大全 ... intervene v． 介入,干涉 meddle v 干涉,干预,乱搞 | interloper n. (非法) 闯入者,干涉 (他人之事) 者.
英语中读音相近的词_百度文库 ... model 模特 meddle 玩弄 pat 轻拍.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'mingle, mix'): from Old French medler, variant of mesler, based on Latin miscere 'to mix'

entry.def: If you say that someone meddles in something, you are criticizing the fact that they try to influence or change it without being asked.

example.ex: Already some people are asking whether scientists have any right to meddle in such matters...
example.tran: 已经有人在问科学家是否有权干预这类事情。

example.ex: If only you hadn't felt compelled to meddle.
example.tran: 要是你没有觉得非插手不可就好了。

means.word_mean: 1. intrude in other people's affairs or business; interfere unwantedly;

auth_sentence.content: You should not meddle with them; they are not yours.
auth_sentence.res_content: You should not meddle with them; they are not yours.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You should not meddle with them; they are not yours.

auth_sentence.content: He added that the army would not meddle in political quarrels.
auth_sentence.res_content: He added that the army would not meddle in political quarrels.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He added that the army would not meddle in political quarrels.

auth_sentence.content: They followed Shariatmadari, and they didn't meddle in politics.
auth_sentence.res_content: They followed Shariatmadari, and they didn't meddle in politics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They followed Shariatmadari, and they didn't meddle in politics.

means.word_mean: 干涉, 干预(他人事务)

sentences.en: I hope he doesn’t try to meddle in my affairs.
sentences.cn: 我希望他不来干预我的事情。
